Container.Name: flaresolverr
Container.Overview: FlareSolverr is a proxy server to bypass Cloudflare protection. Useful as a companion for indexer proxies such as Prowlarr and Jackett.

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Verbosity of the logging. Use `LOG_LEVEL=debug` for more information.

Config.Name: Time Zone
Config.Description: Timezone used in the logs and the web browser.
